DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomize control study conduct 12 month period , adolescent two public secondary school , Lisbon . At begin , total 275 adolescent student age 15-17 year old evaluate photogrammetry . The student screen measure cervical ( CV ) shoulder ( SH ) angle photogrammetry . If CV SH angle less 50º 52º respectively , adolescent consider forward head posture ( FHP ) protract shoulder ( PS ) select study . Participants exclude CV SH angle equal high 50º 52º respectively , visual deficit , diagnose balance disorder , musculoskeletal pathology , history shoulder surgery , cervical thoracic fracture , non-ambulatory , displayed functional structural scoliosis , excessive thoracic kyphosis . After eligible student randomly assign control interventional group . The intervention group begin 32-week stretch strengthen program perform last part Physical Education ( PE ) class . The control group participate PE class . Since 32th week 48th week experimental group follow interventional training program group participate PE class . The program constitute four strengthening exercise three stretch exercise design base assumption use therapeutic exercise effective correction specific neck shoulder posture . The training exercise protocol design correction FHP PS , target selective activation lower trapezius , middle trapezius rhomboid , lengthen pectoralis major , pectoralis minor sternocleidomastoid improvement deep cervical flexor function This program go apply last 15-20 minute PE class , twice week , supervision help PE teacher .
